snippet: A bus accident that killed 15 people provides a grim corroboration for a study finding that Thailand has the world’s second-highest road fatality rate.
abstract: Bus in Thailand, carrying schoolgirls on a class trip, collides with a truck on a provincial highway, killing 15 people; accident occurs a week after release of study concluding that Thailand has the world's second-highest road fatality rate.
lead_paragraph: A bus accident that killed 15 people provides a grim corroboration for a study finding that Thailand has the world’s second-highest road fatality rate.

headline.main: Crash That Kills Schoolgirls Highlights Thai Road Dangers
headline.print_headline: Thailand: Students Killed in Bus Crash
